misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his dedication and sharp wit on the course. Representing Keimola Golf, Timo has been a consistent presence in past Hector Trophée competitions. His precise and calculated approach has made him a formidable opponent.

Beyond his technical skills, Timo is known for his sportsmanship and willingness to help fellow players. His involvement extends beyond the game itself, as he is a well-known ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting, often sharing his insights with others.

With several past appearances at the Hector Trophée and an impressive three victories in the team competition, Timo brings a wealth of experience to every tournament. Despite not participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his influence remains strong, and his contributions to the sport continue to inspire many.
